```{r}
library(DT)
library(tidyverse)

rankings <- read.csv("d1_rankings.csv") %>% 
  mutate(team_name = paste0("<a href='../team_info?teamID=", team_id, "'>", team_name, "</a>")) %>% 
  select(-logo, -team_id)
  

DT::datatable(rankings, 
              colnames=c("Team", "Record", "RPI", "NFCA", "Offensive Rank", "Defensive Rank", "Power Rank"),
              options = list(
                pageLength = 25,
                columnDefs = list(list(targets = 4, className = "dt-border-right dt-right"))
              ),
              width = "80%",
              escape = FALSE,
              rownames = FALSE
)
```
